name: Heading South
description:
‘Heading South’ is a tale of a flock of sparrows that is forced to flee from an eternal winter. On this journey traversing a picture book landscape, you will be prompted with the impact of departure and leaving behind. Leading your sparrows, you must outmaneuver and eventually kill hostile flocks in this 2D top-down flock combat game, whilst enabling your own playstyle.

This game currently has two levels and is playable with keyboard or a gamepad.

Created as a semester project at the University of Applied Sciences, Darmstadt, Faculty of Media.

Telegram Sticker Set:

https://t.me/addstickers/BirdsHeadingSouth

A game by:

Markus Vollmer - Game Designer, Gameplay Programmer

Bjarne Reimers - Lead Programmer

Jaina Tschritter - Production Manager, Programmer

Frederike Hantschel - Art Director, Narrative Designer
